name.en: Adaptive Data Analysis in Cognitive Neuroscience
name.ch: 自適性資料分析在認知神經科學上的應用

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 認識並應用自適性資料分析
goal.en: Knowing how to perform adaptive data analyses

outline.ch:
1. EMD/EEMD/CEEMDAN
2. The instantaneous frequency and the amplitude function
3. The two-layer EMD and Holo-Hilbert Spectrum
4. The Holo-Hilbert Cross-Frequency Phase Clustering
5. The Multiscale Entropy
6. The Intrinsic Multiscale Entropy (iMSE)
7. Intrinsic Event-Related Potentials
outline.en:
1. EMD/EEMD/CEEMDAN
2. The instantaneous frequency and the amplitude function
3. The two-layer EMD and Holo-Hilbert Spectrum
4. The Holo-Hilbert Cross-Frequency Phase Clustering
5. The Multiscale Entropy
6. The Intrinsic Multiscale Entropy (iMSE)
7. Intrinsic Event-Related Potentials

instructMethod.ch:
講授

實習/實驗
個別指導

gradMethod.ch:
出席 40％
報告 30％
實作 30％
gradMethod.en:
出席 40％
報告 30％
實作 30％

flexDiscription.en: The courses in weeks 17-18 will be conducted by applying adaptive analyses to actual EEG data. Students are required to prepare their own data beforehand.

domain.ch: 認知神經科學與物理學的跨領域研究
domain.en: 認知神經科學與物理學的跨領域研究

ch.competencies: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫
溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en.competencies: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

ch: 系所:限認知神經科學研究所碩士班、認知神經科學研究所博士班、跨領域神經科學博士學位學程(台灣聯合大學系統)、跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
en: Department:Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、International Ph.D. program in Interdisciplinary neuroscience (University System of Taiwan)、International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
